name: Softball Club
description:
Like baseball Recruit softball players and train them to build the best team of your own.
Softball Club is the first globally available sports management game for softball.
With its simple controls and quick gameplay, Softball Club is the game you can casually play on.
Dive into the world of exciting softball games where the best players compete, and feel the thrill of it!

■ Build a training facility with professional training equipment.
- Install a variety of training equipment to boost abilities of your players.
- Build a PR Room to promote star athletes of your team & get more fans.
- Decorate accommodation rooms to keep your players in their best condition.

■ Recruit star athletes to be the pillar of your team.
- Unique and talented players are waiting to be chosen. Pick the best ones to nail the game.
- After recruit, freely set player positions and substitutes, and manage them systematically.
- Gear up your players to boost their abilities. Or dress them up in different costumes.

■ Sometimes harsh training is needed to make your players stronger.
- From Climbing Mt Everest to swimming battle in Hawaii and training on a desert island!
- These unprecedentedly hellish trainings will maximize your player’s ability.
- Don’t forget to give reward items and recover player’s HP after the training.

■ Compete with a rival team to get the knack of the game.
- You can have a match with your rivals anytime.
- See the result of the tough trainings. Show off your players and beat the opponent.
- Utilize Chance when it occurs during the match to keep holding the lead or turn the game around.

Softball Club boasts quick and speedy gameplay with simple and easy, touch-based controls.
Enjoy making home runs and strikeouts while you casually play anytime, anywhere!

Language support:English, Japanese.Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, German, Italian, Spanish, French, Portuguese, Vietnamese, Turkish, Thai, Russian, Indonesian, Malaysian.
